TextLibrary.Text: I... I'm scared. I don't like where we're going.
I... I'm scared. I don't like where we're going.
I... I'm scared. I don't like where we're going.
I... I'm scared. I don't like where we're going.
Now isn't the time to worry, Princess. When we have what we need and we finally confront Bane... THEN you can start worrying.
Now isn't the time to worry, Princess. When we have what we need and we finally confront Bane... THEN you can start worrying.
Now isn't the time to worry, Princess. When we have what we need and we finally confront Bane... THEN you can start worrying.
Now isn't the time to worry, Princess. When we have what we need and we finally confront Bane... THEN you can start worrying.
There is something wrong about going on a mission of Lord Bane's choosing. It's a trap. If you start following that sword in any direction, then I'm leaving.
